attributes.action: Return to his and parliaments constutional submission to the Crown and utterly reject his and thiers servile subjection to the dictations of the head of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lawfull and constitutional head of this country is the monarch.In her person is all the lawfull power and authority to rule and govern the country,Constitutionaly that power is, at her will put in the hands of parliament.So that on her behalf they may by her authority govern the country (but NOT rule)Thus each MP must and does swear an oath and bow the head in willing and free submissionl;recognising from where thier power and authority comes from.Mr Brown being only her first or Prime  minister.You cannot serve two masters.You will love the one and hate the other.If then this parliament in general and this goverment in particular is subjecting themselves  and the country to the dictations of the  as yet unseen head of Europe.They are no longer subject to the crown.and have no legal or constitutional right to govern or subject the country to a foriegn power.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
